thread.title: Italian bank offers customers cash, coffee and cake.

title: Italian bank offers customers cash, coffee and cake.
text:
Italian bank offers customers cash, coffee and cake. 5:24pm GMT - 01:20 
Italy's top pastry chef, Iginio Massari, is banking on his latest patisserie to set a new trend. As Pascale Davies reports, he's a coffee shop inside a bank branch in central Milan.   
Italy's top pastry chef, Iginio Massari, is banking on his latest patisserie to set a new trend. As Pascale Davies reports, he's a coffee shop inside a bank branch in central Milan.  //uk.reuters.com/video/2018/03/14/italian-bank-offers-customers-cash-coffe?videoId=408946811&videoChannel=78
